# currentISO

**Type Property**

A constant to indicate not to specify a new ISO value, and instead set it to its current value.

## Declaration

```swift
class let currentISO: Float
```

## Discussion

A special value that you may pass as the ISO parameter of the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/setExposureModeCustom(duration:iso:completionHandler:)] method to indicate that the caller doesn’t specify a value for the ISO property, and to instead set to its current value.



## Exposure constants

- **currentExposureDuration**: A special constant representing the current exposure duration setting.
